patient_info: Ventricular fibrillation,Pneumonia,Dyspnea,Exercise intolerance,Viral hepatitis,ST segment elevation,Cough
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Neonatal Marfan syndrome with cardiomyopathy and conduction abnormalities
2. Viral myocarditis with arrhythmias and concurrent pneumonia
3. Cardiomyopathy (dilated or hypertrophic) with arrhythmias and respiratory infection
4. Infectious myocarditis due to viral hepatitis with cardiac complications
5. Primary arrhythmia disorder (e.g., long QT syndrome) presenting with ventricular fibrillation and pneumonia
6. Acute coronary syndrome complicated by myocardial infection and respiratory illness
7. Endocarditis with myocardial involvement and concurrent pneumonia
8. Pulmonary hypertension with right heart failure, arrhythmias, and pneumonia
9. Connective tissue disorder (other than Marfan syndrome) with cardiovascular involvement and respiratory infection
10. Metabolic or genetic disorder causing cardiomyopathy and immune dysfunction, leading to pneumonia and arrhythmias.
